body: Looks like a bug for when you just have a single surface with no context but it should not make an issue in your case. Keep the test points closer to the surface. Looks like you have set distance from surface to a very high number which will gives you a wrong result. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9OeEfGTiwadIdvKo9gE*PkvE*umy*JrF-slFYdHWj6ITmoEqj6ol-pKeUX76I7YE-aoKq3EMFqHoieee-XfkoH1BvJVYyDp-/legend.jpg) In any case you can use create legend component to create your own legend based on the results of the analysis and [orient them to the camera](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/legend-facing-camera?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1206666&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987).
